experience: You and Oliver both know Eric Kuhn, Dan Tyre, and 18 others

- Created product and platform specifications for the first integrated News Analytics platform.- Continued build-out of platform that combines innovative low-latency data feeds, business intelligence & Windows Azure based cloud-based technologies.- Extensive work with engineering team to drive specifications, roadmap, product development- Implement strategic alliances with customers, vendors and partners.- Negotiated market data re-distribution agreements with Nasdaq, New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) and secured content from all major US newswires.

Leverage broad competencies in operations management, relationship-building and IT product development to implement strategic planning initiatives that support corporate goals. Built a highly effective and productive team of only three members, growing the US equities trading volume from zero to over $1B annually in three short years. Managed the development of custom software to validate trading models on multiple terabytes of historical market data. - Designed low latency software solution to process large amounts of news, company and market data in real-time and execute relevant orders without delay. - Implemented a compression algorithm so data could be stored internally on servers without the need of an external storage solution. - Reduced technology expenses by 90% and more than doubled output generation.

Brought on board as a Consultant providing direction when a large publicly traded company of the Austrian subsidiary defaulted on the last payment. Managed the arbitration case, being the interface of the US holding, representing the shareholders and the foreign lawyers. Managed the financial risk of legal case.- Negotiated with multiple European insurance companies to underwrite the risk in exchange for a fee. Selected Allianz Group to underwrite 100% of the litigation risk. - Successfully negotiated an all cash settlement.

Rapidly transformed company into an operationally efficient and highly productive organization. Built operations in five countries: Hungary, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland and Slovenia with headquarters in Vienna, Austria and negotiated vendor financing with major US equipment provider. - Effectively managed M&A bankers and developed presentation for road-show, presenting for 20 VC firms in London, New York, Frankfurt and Vienna. - Raised over $40M in venture capital from three VC firms.
Managing Director, (1998-2000) - Co-Founder & Director Sales & Marketing (1997-1998)

Developed a strategy to sign the first interconnection agreement in Austria with incumbent Telecom operator, months earlier than the competition. - Produced $25M in Austrian telecom sales within the first year with a small direct sales force and a marketing budget of $50K.  - Quickly became profitable in year two (2) and subsequently orchestrated the sale of the company to the 5th-largest publicly traded Telecom company in the world.

summary: Oliver is the Co-Founder and CEO of News Quantified, the first service to provide real-time integration of news and market data. News Quantified provides trading firms, fund managers, analysts, IR professionals, corporate communication teams and news organizations with powerful analytics to generate insights from market moving news, earnings and other corporate events. Historical data is used to predict how corporate announcements impact stock prices by benchmarking against historic events.For the past 15 years, Oliver successfully built four start-up companies, raised over $50m in venture capital AND grew a US equities trading firm to over $1b trading volume in three years. When the European Telecom market de-regulated, he signed the first interconnection agreement in Austria leading to an acquisition by a Fortune Global 100 company.Specialities: start-ups, business models, joint ventures & strategic partnerships, negotiation, cloud-based analytics
name: Oliver Schmalholz
title: CEO at News Quantified LLC
